name: Max Air BMX
description:
Extreme BMX stunt action!

Choose a bike and tear up the halfpipe. Get big air and perform insane flip and spin tricks. Pull off huge trick combos and become the best BMX rider on the Planet!

Pick your style.
Over 12 bikes with unique paint jobs and 5 characters to choose from. Collect them all and ride with style.

Ride around the world.
Explore halfpipes and skate parks from real life locations all over the world. Launch off mega ramps or carve the pool.

Big Air Tricks.
Tailwhips, Bar Spins, Flairs and much more. Combine tricks and get crazy scores. Pump your adrenaline with high speeds and outrageous heights.

Simple to pick up and play. Show off your skills and creativity. Become the BMX rider you want to be now!
